mapper.select: select id, kind, place_name, event_name, start_date, finish_date, phone, place_url, detail, address_name, road_address_name, lat, lng,review_num,sum_rate from Welfare order by id desc
select id, kind, place_name, event_name, start_date, finish_date, phone, place_url, detail, address_name, road_address_name, lat, lng, review_num, sum_rate from Welfare where id = #{id}
mapper.update: update Welfare set id = #{id}, kind = #{kind}, place_name = #{place_name}, event_name = #{event_name}, start_date = #{start_date}, finish_date = #{finish_date}, phone = #{phone}, place_url = #{place_url}, detail = #{detail}, address_name = #{address_name}, road_address_name = #{road_address_name}, lat = #{lat}, lng = #{lng} where id = #{id}
update Welfare set review_num = (select count(*) from ReviewWelfare where welfare_id=#{id}), sum_rate = (select sum(review_rate) from ReviewWelfare where welfare_id=#{id}) where id = #{id}
